name: Ninja Newton
description:
Swing your trusty grapple hook and explore the world of Newtonia in this exciting new gravity game! Explore the world, climb the magic tower and compete with your friends!

- A physics-based grappling hook game
- Non-linear open world map with lots of levels
- Procedurally generated high score tower
- Game Center leaderboards
- Lots of upgrades and achievements
- Original 8-bit music

Some voices about Ninja Newton:

"Ninja Newton brings surprising depth to its swinging arcade gameplay."
"Gameplay is so fun and so endlessly replayable that we dare players not to get hooked." - 148apps review

"Haven't got the boat yet and I'm trying to get to 1000m in the central castle - and I can't see me stopping playing until I've nailed each level :-)"

"At first I wasn't sure about the grappling, but then it clicked...and it's pretty much all I've played since I bought it"

"I don't just recommend this game, if you like high score chasing arcade/adventure games...GET THIS GAME"
